generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and a manhole cover, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the left side of the road, adjacent to the brick building, and also on the right side of the road.
- building: There are multiple buildings visible in the image, including a prominent brick building on the left and other buildings further down the street.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the street, particularly on the right side and in the background.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a blue sign with a white arrow and a circular sign with a red border and blue center.
- pole: Poles are visible throughout the image, supporting traffic signs and possibly traffic lights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, showing red lights.
- car: A white van and a silver car are visible driving on the road.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
